body.p:
You can use the Index Terms action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Content generation category to ask the AI Positron to create and insert index term elements in a DITA topic's prolog based on the selected content.

An Index Terms AI action greatly benefits end users by simplifying the process of organizing and categorizing large amounts of information. This AI action automatically generates index terms for documents, saving users valuable time and effort that they would otherwise spend manually identifying and labeling relevant terms. The AI analyzes the content, identifies key concepts, and generates a comprehensive list of index terms that accurately represent the main ideas of the content.
Open the topic and invoke the Short Description action.
